name: DEMO_2D_Ball Parallax and Collection
description:
A small, sonic style ball rolling demo including:

  • A ball rolling player controller with surface effector jump ramps
  • A simple parallax style repeating background
  • An animated coin and collection system
  • A UI for showing collected number of points

Please find the Unity Assets Available Here:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/15vsYGpuLVN7X5hZnzL1bf6CUy1JJcSIC/view?usp=share...
